channel.title: Project Insanity ::hide Command
channel.description:
Tried writing 3 different scripts nothing seems to work..
Anyone have a ::hide command on PI that makes them invisble and there dot on the map invisible? Need one badly. Thanks.

item.title: Project Insanity ::hide Command
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

You could have it stop updating yourself to players in the region. Your dot and yourself will be hidden from them entirely, however you will still be able to see yourself.

Read full topic

@helloimwhite wrote:

i believe in your chat handler thingy, where ever that is… put like <img = 1> cuz all the mod crows download into cache, so you cant get to them

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity ::hide Command
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I’d also like to figure out how to remove the dot.

EDIT:
I found out how to do it, however it’s client sided. So it would only apply to you, everyone else would still see your “dot”

In a 317 renamed client search for:

you will see codes like markMinimap(mapDotItem, l, j3); markMinimap(mapDotNPC, i1, k3); and if(flag1) markMinimap(mapDotFriend, j1, l3); else if(flag3) markMinimap(mapDotClan, j1, l3); else if(flag2) markMinimap(mapDotTeam, j1, l3); else markMinimap(mapDotPlayer, j1, l3);

Comment those out and the dots disappear. You can still see your own dot which is the shape of a square, but nobody can see your dot, if they’re using the exact same client as you.

I hope i helped…

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity ::hide Command
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:2, topic:398156”]Whell i dont have the script…

but all you need to do is find the ID of a null npc
and use that with ::pnpc

idk about the dot on the map tho…[/quote]

I am aware of this, but its the dot im having problems with…

Read full topic
